sentences.english: But do not want to because homicide suspicion is closed by Bao Weixiong, enter prison at the beginning.
sentences.chinese: 但不想一開始就因爲殺人嫌疑被包偉雄關進大牢。

sentences.english: He has recorded a song with an accompaniment by himself, planning to say his words by the song.
sentences.chinese: 偉灌錄了一首自彈自唱的歌曲，打算向寶憑歌寄意。

sentences.english: Wai is so glad that he discovers Bo standing in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 偉一天最高興便是在聽歌的人羣中發現了駐足的寶。

sentences.english: A little body doth often harbour a great soul.
sentences.chinese: 偉除夜的心靈常寓於矮小的身軀當中。

sentences.english: The time is the greatest cure teacher.
sentences.chinese: 時間是蕞偉夶的治癒師。

sentences.english: The Weideshan complex located at the eastern edge of Jiaodong Peninsular.
sentences.chinese: 偉德山花崗岩體位於膠東半島的東部。

sentences.english: We would like to welcome David West to our school.
sentences.chinese: 我們歡迎外籍教師張大偉先生來校任教。

sentences.english: Two samples of the bilingual calligraphy devised by Mr David Moser.
sentences.chinese: 上面是美國的莫大偉先生設計的雙語書法的兩份樣圖。
